com.ontotext.s4.client

Class HttpClientException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.ontotext.s4.client.HttpClientException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class HttpClientException
extends RuntimeException
    Exception representing any problem communicating with the S4 REST API. In cases where the server could successfully be contacted but it returned an error response (4xx or 5xx) with a JSON response body, that response will be available as a JsonNode from the getResponse() method.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getResponse()
      If this exception resulted from a 4xx or 5xx error response from the server, this method provides access to the response body.

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode getResponse()
        If this exception resulted from a 4xx or 5xx error response from the server, this method provides access to the response body.
        Returns:
        the error response body as a Jackson JsonNode, or null if no response is available (e.g. if this exception wraps an IOException rather than representing an error response from the server).
